item.title: Braised Pigs Cheeks - Spanish
item.description: Ingredients 1-2 tbsp olive oil 1 large onion, finely chopped 800g pork cheeks (ideally Ibérico Pork), excess fat & sinew trimmed and cut in half 1 tbsp flour, seasoned with salt and pepper 2 garlic cloves, crushed ½ tsp ground cumin 1 tsp pimentón de la Vera (smoked paprika) 100ml sherry vinegar (I’d half this) 500ml beef or pork stock Handful flat-leaf parsley 400g can of butter beans, drained & rinsed 1 garlic clove 70-100ml olive oil Method
